page.title: 19FISHING IN FENLAND
page.content: The main{waterways}for fishing are Tydd Cut (or North Holland Main Drain),Black Dyke, New Cut and Dave Troughton's Fish Pond.{Freshwater {fish}such as Pike,Bream,Roach,Rudd and Eels can be caught in the rivers; spinning hooks are mainly used for catching Pike. Dave Troughton's Fish Pond is private, and permission from the owner is needed. There is mainly Tench available, but also a large stock of Gudgeon. A rod licence is required by law for anyone over the age of 13,before they can go fishing. For{bait,}Maggots, Worms or pieces of bread may be used. Bronze maggots are illegal because of health risks. The usual{tackle}consists of a rod,line,reel,floats,hooks,disgorger, keep_net, landing_net, ledger, umbrella and a tackle box.
